main event: A stationary unidentified flying object (UFO) was observed on July 8, 1963, in Oakhurst, New Jersey, by multiple witnesses.
interesting points: The UFO was seen at regular intervals traveling in various directions,The object appeared very bright, similar to a star but larger,Multiple witnesses included the observer's parents,The report mentions that the sighting conforms with ECHO observation reports,The sighting details were recorded in correspondence related to Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a stationary bright object in the sky
witness description: individual who observed the UFO along with their parents
